resources.string: Permission required
Permission denied
Storage permission must be granted to export measurements to a file
Cancelling measurements export due to denied permission
Measurements export is unavailable due to denied storage permission
Storage permission must be granted to use the function
Cancelling the operation due to denied permission
The function is unavailable due to denied storage permission
Temporarily disabling file logging due to denied storage permission
Location and phone permissions must be granted to collect measurements.
If you want to use this function be sure to select \'allow all the time\' option for access device\'s location permission!
If you want to use this function be sure to select \'allow in settings\' and then select \'allow all the time\' option for access device\'s location permission!
Cancelling measurement collecting due to denied permissions
Measurement collecting is unavailable due to denied location and/or phone permissions
Measurement collecting is unavailable due to denied background location and/or phone permissions
Cancelling measurement collecting due to denied permissions, open the app to grant necessary permissions first
Disabling start at device boot due to denied background location permission.
Location permission must be granted to display your location on the map.
The map cannot be enabled due to denied location permission
The map is unavailable due to denied location permission
Upload cancelled due to denied internet permission.
